backend/main.mo: Defines main backend actor with ordered maps and type models for journeys, locations, users, media, schedules, bookmarks, geoname cities, and layout settings.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, descriptions, impacted files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend source files describing their roles and recent updates.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that loads the main React script and includes suncalc library.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring providers, query client, Internet Identity, and rendering LocationMapExplorer with BackendDebugger.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel component handling journey and schedule CRUD, date‑range calendar popover, and accordion‑based management UI.
Utility component exposing the backend actor to window.console with role checks and temporary admin utilities.
frontend/src/components/CityAlbumManager: Manages city albums with media uploads, social media links, validation, and integration with identity and backend queries.
frontend/src/components/CityloguePanel.t: Empty file placeholder with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/GeonameGeographi: Provides UI to import, search, paginate, add, edit, and delete Geoname city records, including file parsing and classification logic.
frontend/src/components/HeartRating.tsx: Interactive 10-heart rating component supporting partial fills, hover effects, and click-based fine‑grained rating selection.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveGlobe: Large 3D globe component handling rendering, overlays, city markers, time zones, animations, and interaction via Three.js.
frontend/src/components/LocationInfoDial: Dialog for adding, updating, or deleting location info with image upload, preview, and backend integration.
frontend/src/components/LoginPanel.tsx: Authentication panel using Internet Identity with login/logout handling, status display, and UI dialog controls.
frontend/src/components/MapComponent.tsx: Interactive Leaflet-based map component that loads travel spots, schedule items, and bookmarks, rendering markers with custom icons and popups.
frontend/src/components/MediaGalleryPopu: Displays media files and social media embeds in a tabbed gallery, separating photos, videos, and external links.
frontend/src/components/MusicAlbumManage: Admin UI for creating, editing, and deleting music albums and songs, including file uploads and metadata management.
frontend/src/components/MusicPanel.tsx: Popup panel showing music albums and songs, allowing selection of tracks and integrating with authentication state.
frontend/src/components/MusicPlayerBar.t: Audio player bar that plays songs from all albums, handling playback state, progression, volume, and external song selection.
frontend/src/components/TimezoneManageme: Uploads, validates, stores, and manually executes GeoJSON timezone data using backend actor and IndexedDB.
Displays journeys with collapsible itineraries, editing of schedule items, filtering, and optional flight animation via geocoding.
frontend/src/components/TravelSpotManage: Provides full CRUD for travel spots with media uploads, social links, filtering by city, and a form-driven dialog UI.
frontend/src/components/VibesPanel.tsx: Shows categorized bookmarks and travel spots by city with enhanced type metadata and expandable sections.
frontend/src/components/WebsiteLayoutPan: Manages layout preferences such as music player toggle and default search place through a settings dialog.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, handling login states and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps react-query with backend actor calls and utilities like country normalization, social URL validation, and geocoding.
frontend/src/hooks/useRowWrapBreaks.ts: Detects row breaks in a wrapped flex container by tracking item positions and returns indices for rendering connectors.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables for light/dark modes, and styling rules for headings and layout.
frontend/src/lib/solarCalculations.ts: Provides solar declination calculations and test cases for validating astronomical angle computations.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneOffsetUtils.ts: Utility for determining timezone IDs matching a UTC offset using quarter-hour rounding and DST-aware Intl APIs.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneUtils.ts: Loads, validates, caches, and retrieves timezone GeoJSON data using IndexedDB and a backend fallback.
frontend/src/lib/TzOverlayV2.ts: Implements timezone boundary rendering on a 3D globe with coordinate utilities, offset lookup, and overlay group management.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root and wraps it with query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CountryMapExplorer.ts: Placeholder page file with no current implementation.
frontend/src/pages/LocationMapExplorer.t: Implements an interactive 2D/3D map explorer with search, UI panels, city layers, and travel-related features.
frontend/src/utils/itineraryDateFormat.t: Formats a start/end date range into a compact human-readable itinerary string.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project state, requirements, and layout changes for itinerary and schedule views.
